1396020.name: Fill and Cross Royal Riddles
1396020.description:
Solve the king's puzzles and gain access to his treasures!

Solve 108 unique puzzles in 9 elegant locations in different corners of the royal castle.

More than 4 hours of gameplay, atmospheric music, magnificent trophies and full immersion in a world of royal puzzles.

1. Outwit the king – solve all his puzzles!
2. More than 4 hours of gameplay.
3. 108 original puzzles.
4. Really magnificent trophies.
5. Elegant interior scenes of the royal castle.
1396020.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 俄语
